participant_1.background:
I'm not an excellent cook, but I do my best to make meals that my mom enjoys.
My job at the gas station is going well, but I'm having trouble keeping up with my schoolwork.
I was bullied for being overweight as a child.
I stopped by my local sushi bar on my way home from work to pick up a delicious meal.
i work in the pharmaceutical industry.

participant_2.background:
I am a talented singer, and I am proud to be a member of my church choir.
I don't play any sports, but I enjoy hiking and biking on my days off.
I teach my students about art and share my opinions about art on the internet.
I binged on British shows and movies while I was confined to my bed on vacation.
my favorite book is jane austen s pride and prejudice.

content.text: Hello! How is your day going?
Not great. I just got back from a week long vacation, and I have so much work to do when I get home. How is your day going?
That sucks. I just got off work. I am a cashier at a gas station. I went to a sushi bar on my way home. It was pretty good.
I love sushi! I am a teacher. I have to go home and grade papers. I am dreading it.
I am not a teacher, but I have a hard time keeping up with schoolwork. I am taking classes online.
My favorite book is Pride and Prejudice. I love British shows and movies. I spent my vacation binge watching them.
I have never seen Pride and Prejudice. I am not a big fan of British shows or movies. I am more into action and adventure.
I like those too. I just like British shows and movies because they are so well written.
I like to watch movies to relax. I am not very good at paying attention to the details.
I am the opposite. I love to pick apart movies and find the hidden meanings.
I have to go now. I have to get ready for bed. It was nice talking to you.
You too. Have a good night!
